hero_image.title: Hero image - Architektura headless
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczna kompozycja z laptopem pokazującym architektury headless vs traditional
hero_image.alt_text: Laptop z porównaniem architektury headless i tradycyjnej na czystym biurku
hero_image.prompt: Clean minimalist workspace top-down view, laptop showing split-screen comparison of headless architecture (separated frontend/backend blocks) vs traditional monolithic system, white desk, minimal items, natural window lighting from side, muted colors black white gray, subtle yellow accent on notebook, professional business aesthetic, high quality, shallow depth of field, no people

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean workspace, no people, modern minimalist aesthetic matching digitalvantage.pl brand

section_media.title: Diagram architektury headless vs tradycyjnej
section_media.description: Schemat porównujący tradycyjną architekturę monolityczną z architekturą headless
section_media.alt_text: Diagram porównania architektury headless z oddzielonym frontendem i backendem
section_media.prompt: Professional technical diagram showing traditional monolithic architecture on left (single connected block) versus headless architecture on right (separated frontend and backend blocks connected by API), clean minimalist design, black and gray colors with yellow highlights for API connections, white background, professional infographic style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean technical diagram, professional style, minimalist colors matching brand

section_media.title: Porównanie CMS - tradycyjny vs headless
section_media.description: Infografika zestawiająca kluczowe różnice między tradycyjnym CMS a headless CMS
section_media.alt_text: Infografika porównanie tradycyjny CMS WordPress vs headless CMS Strapi
section_media.prompt: Split comparison infographic showing traditional CMS (WordPress icon, coupled frontend/backend) versus headless CMS (Strapi/Contentful icons, separated API-first architecture), professional design with icons and bullet points, black white gray color scheme with yellow accents, clean minimalist layout

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Split-screen comparison design, professional icons, clean typography

section_media.title: Wykres wpływu szybkości ładowania na konwersję
section_media.description: Wykres słupkowy pokazujący spadek konwersji w zależności od czasu ładowania strony
section_media.alt_text: Wykres wpływu czasu ładowania strony na współczynnik konwersji w e-commerce
section_media.prompt: Clean bar chart showing conversion rate decrease with page loading time, x-axis showing seconds (1s, 2s, 3s, 5s, 7s), y-axis showing conversion percentage, declining blue bars, professional minimalist design, values clearly labeled

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean professional chart, can be created with ChartJS or Canva templates

section_media.title: Interfejs Strapi CMS
section_media.description: Screenshot panelu administracyjnego Strapi pokazujący zarządzanie treścią
section_media.alt_text: Panel administracyjny Strapi CMS z interfejsem zarządzania treścią headless
section_media.prompt: Clean screenshot mockup of Strapi CMS admin panel showing content management interface, collection types sidebar, content entries list, modern dark theme UI, professional software interface design, highlighted important navigation elements

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Modern software interface, clean design, could use official Strapi screenshots or create mockup

section_media.title: Flowchart procesu migracji na headless
section_media.description: Schemat krok-po-kroku procesu migracji z tradycyjnego CMS na headless
section_media.alt_text: Schemat 5-etapowego procesu migracji na architekturę headless
section_media.prompt: Professional flowchart showing 5-step migration process to headless: 1) Audit, 2) Choose platform, 3) MVP development, 4) Content migration, 5) Full launch. Connected arrows, numbered steps with icons, minimalist design, black gray colors with yellow highlights

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Linear flowchart with numbered steps, professional business style

section_media.title: Porównanie kosztów - tradycyjny vs headless (5 lat)
section_media.description: Wykres liniowy porównujący całkowite koszty posiadania przez 5 lat
section_media.alt_text: Wykres kosztów TCO tradycyjny CMS vs headless przez 5 lat działalności
section_media.prompt: Professional line chart comparing total cost of ownership over 5 years, two lines - traditional CMS (steeper growth) vs headless (initial higher cost, then slower growth), intersection point around year 2, clean design with legend, values in PLN

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional financial chart, two contrasting lines, clear intersection point
